PerfectNetExp.abs: 麝香（musk）(Musk)：是从雄性喜马拉雅麝鹿身上提取的颗粒状晶体，囊体约有胡桃大小，提取过程毋需杀害麝鹿。在所有香料品种中，香味 …
...t 藓类泥炭 mosses 藓类 ... 残丘 mosore ... 3青苔后味青苔(mosses)和麝香(musk)香调会比较明显，是属于比较清爽一点的香味，不像精华液闻起来直接就是馥郁的高雅花香。4苔类... 苔藓.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin muscus, from Persian muŝk, perhaps from Sanskrit muṣka 'scrotum'(because of the similarity in shape of a musk deer's musk bag)

entry.def: Musk is a substance with a strong smell which is used in making perfume.

means.word_mean: 1. an odorous glandular secretion from the male musk deer; used as a perfume fixative

sentences.en: Musk is produced naturally by the musk deer and is used to attract other deer sexually.
sentences.cn: 麝香是由雄麝天然产生用以吸引雌麝的。
